name: mapbox-directions-api
description: JS API abstraction for Mapbox Directions API

scripts.test: jshint src && npm run build && browserify --debug test/test.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b firefox | tap-spec
scripts.test:cr: jshint src && npm run build && browserify --debug test/test.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b chrome | tap-spec
